name: Applied Chronometrics
story_text: Time slows down around you. Your heartbeat is the only gauge of the extra moments you've gained.

low.conditions: You target two creatures one of which can be you

mid.conditions: You target three creatures one of which can be you

high.conditions: You target four creatures one of which can be you

effect: Until the start of your next turn, each target gains a +5 bonus to speed, they can't be made dazed, and they can use an additional maneuver on their turn. If a target is already dazed, that condition ends for them.
special_effect: Strained: Your speed is halved until the end of the encounter.
